name: Tini design system
description:
The Tiki's Tini Apps design team builds a design system for the Tini App platform based on the Tiki design system. The Tini will help product designers to uniform the user interfaces to focus on a better user experience, deliver ideas and products faster.


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community or read our Vietnamese design topics at Facebook & Instagram


v2.3

March 31st, 2022

 

Today, the Tini design system is 1 year old. We started with 7 global styles and 29 components and now we have 30 text styles, 62 color global styles, more than 100 color tokens, and 44 components.


Let’s celebrate with some improvement:

  • Search & Date field: Change field wrapper's resizing to fill container.
  • Carousel: Now we have a navigation button for desktop usage. Fix the scaling behavior of the image
  • Alphabet: Increase touch zone
  • Step: Add tokens for error state
  • Section & Card: Improve spacing and customized zone

What’s new?

  • Tab: Add scrollable Basic tab and scrollable Advance tab (mostly used for desktop)
  • Sheet: Add the center sheet, a variant of the bottom sheet, but used on a desktop.
  • Tini - Flight booking template: Click here

 

Yes, you see the word “Desktop” a lots. You know something is coming, right?

See you next month.
